Text: RE HiIve been dying to call you all day to make sure you were okay but I figured your probably being bombarded with calls right now so I was just waiting for some time There are a lot of rumors out there Are you okay The latest piece of news is your possible chapter filing and Ive been raking my mind trying to see if you guys will be taken care of in that case I know you all have personal contracts Its amazing how a great company like Enron can come tumbling down to its knees I cant even imagine the atmosphere over there I was watching the screen as you guys pulled all of your numbers I really couldnt speak for a second This industry is never boring thats for sure Ive been getting calls from everyone it looks like the key word for the day is exposure Original Message From Crandall Sean mailtoSean NRONcom Sent Wednesday November PM To Gill Kiran Subject RE Hi So what do you think Pretty wild huh Original Message From Gill Kiran mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Crandall Sean Subject Hi This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you PGE National Energy Group and any other company referenced herein that uses the PGE name or logo are not the same company as Pacific Gas and Electric Company the regulated California utility Neither PGE National Energy Group nor these other referenced companies are regulated by the California Public Utilities Commission Customers of Pacific Gas and Electric Company do not have to buy products from these companies in order to continue to receive quality regulated services from the utility
